definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Worse, less than 20% return to the business for full-price purchases.
sentences.chinese: 更糟糕的是，購買全價產品的回頭客不足20%。

sentences.english: Are most of your clients, regular or one-offs?
sentences.chinese: 你大部分的客人是回頭客還是一次性的？

sentences.english: Error rates, customer returns, customer satisfaction, new product introduction.
sentences.chinese: 出錯率，回頭客，顧客滿意度，新產品的引入。

sentences.english: However the first tour needs to be very successful to encourage a repeat.
sentences.chinese: 但是要產生回頭客，第一單生意的成功至關重要。

sentences.english: Repeat customers brought in their friends.
sentences.chinese: 回頭客帶來了他們的朋友。

definition: you can net sparrows at the door (idiom); completely deserted
Dacun township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
bad money drives out good money (economics)
pinyin: lie4 bi4 qu1 zhu2 liang2 bi4

definition: front yard as busy as a marketplace (idiom)/a place with many visitors
